title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the software, the view maximized state is lost.
EB: The software should retain the view maximized state when switching perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the software and maximize a view. 
2. Switch perspectives.  
3. Observe that the view is no longer maximized.
